reviews.review: Unfortunately, the game has recently transitioned into a "skill-based match making" system. Which, in an asymmetrical game where 4 players are up against a single player is already a fundamentally bad idea, as every survivor being of the same skill level is massively advantageous to them, whereas the lone killer gains nothing from the higher MMR. But of course on top of that, the system is simply completely broken, and you will be matched against people who have played for thousands of hours the moment you purchase the game. Both survivors and killers play the game much more aggressively now, and having anything close to a fun game is essentially completely impossible.

When playing survivor: Heart is beating, I am scared, my hands are sweating...

Killer: Feel empowered, "run my little mice RUUUN" because I will get you :D :D :D

This game is definitely fun! Played about 6 hours straight lol... what happened to my life :(

Ring ring the bell..

Ring ring for hell..

Each shake gives you quakes..

From this dream..

You can not wake..

10/10 would spook people endless times as the wraithe
Ну что сказать, за мои 25 евро игра оправдала ожидания, советую всем! 10 НЕсбежавших жертв из 10

Great game but struggled to play with friends.

Made a group so that people could group up and play http://steamcommunity.com/groups/DBDP

Баги! Я застрял в текстурах и меня убила инвизная гнида.
Из-за лагучего PIDORASA охотника(ХОСТА) - у меня забрали 3 кристала опыта когда я СБЕЖАЛ!
Everyone buy it so me and Jack can do co-op, c'mahn guys its only crazed masochistic killing machines they wont bite :3 only sacrfice you to their devil gods

I felt like I needed to write a review to help others, and clear up an issue people have with the game. First off the game is wondedrful and unique. I love how the developers wanted to capture the essence of human error in the game with both surviving and hunting. As of right now you can play with friends in a private lobby, and not recieve experience, but the devs. have said they are going to add a party system where you and friends can play together in public matches. They just didn't want it on release, and now I am not entirely sure why they would do this, but I am assuming it is because they don't want a premade team of survivors playing against a new killer and then winning by a landslide. They may also want to get the community more willing to talk and communicate with randoms, who knows. So for those who have decided that you will never get this game if you can't play with friends you WILL be able to, just...not right now.

There is one objective for 4 of the 5 players....SURVIVE.  This game is a blast!  Definitely worth the money 17 dollars.  I was hiding in a basement, the killer looked at my locker, then went to the one accross the room.  I was able to escape, but man was my heart racing.  This game is so much fun.  It reminds me of the fun I had in the original left 4 dead,

Awesome ; shit ton of fun, lots of shoutings on skype with friends in private games.
Love it. 
Just, please add a queue up thingy so we can play games with friends and other random players. 
With that, i'll say 10 / 10 ;)
so good game !

Can not recommend this game so many bugs animations are terrible and worst of all, the killers just sit there and camp the hook while i understand its a good "tatic" is extremelly irriatating you will only be able to save someone 3 out of 10 times. It just makes the game really stupid and they might as well make being put on a hook instant death
was fun before the full release, the new invisible killer is broken asfck, wish i could sell the game.

Inzwischen ist das Spiel mit Freunden zusammen spielbar und macht auch Spaß.
Einziger Kritikpunkt sind die langen Wartezeiten beim Suchen von Spielen. Ansonsten kann man nun ohne Bedenken eine Empfehlung für das Spiel aussprechen, da dieses für nebenher wirklich Spaß macht und Abwechslung bietet.
Das spiel ist mega Geil aber es ist schade, dass man nicht mit freunden ein onlinespiel suchen kann sondern nur Private Spiele zusammen spielen kann.
Обосрался от первого вида маньяка, к концу игры (раунда/катки, называйте как хотите) стал ржать над маньяком от того как он не мог меня найти в траве:) 10 из 10и, люблю за выживших играть
Give it a try, it is fun, but don't take is too seriously

Just WOW...... having watched Horror films a lot this is your chance to star in an 80s horror slasher.
I just had a quick 3 games and was on the edge on my seat every game.
You should pick this up and support the developers.
Very good game I dont write many reviews but really wanted to for thus game.

Jumped from spike and helped another player out a bear trap only to be slashed to bits 10/10

The game does its job of horror and getting your adrenaline running. Nothing like just starting out your first match as a survivor and crawling through the bushes to see the brute-like trapper stomp by then, when you think it is safe, you walk into one of his bear traps and he carries you to the meat hook where you struggle to survive the sacrifice.
Killer is cool to as you can laugh maniacally as you watch survivors on a generator flee like ants as you walk up. Even better feeling when you grab somebody before they jump through a window or as they work on a generator.

I wouldn't listen to all negative reviews from people from day one (June 14th). This game is fun, fair and pretty balanced. Most negative reviews are from people who don't watch the tutorials and can't figure out how to stay alive as a survivor then complain that "This Killer" is OP. I started the game day one of full release and (compared to Beta players) most of the players I went up against were really easy to beat. Running around in circles or thinking they can hide in bushes/against brick walls. I honestly was surprised to see no one utilizing the environment like the tutorial teaches you. This game is great, fun, and gets your heart racing.

They are currently working on the matchmaking system and being able to play with friends+strangers. I honestly would understand if they didn't add a way to play with friends+strangers. It would be to easy to skype/TeamSpeak with your friends to easily just rack up BloodPoints to Level up. Unless they made it (like the Friends-Only play) where you get no bloodpoints and are not allowed to rank up.

I am happy with the way it is now and enjoy the game and look forward to what is to come.

Hello People i'm here to tell you that i like this game quite alot despite the select few complaining it's unballanced cause they suck. git gud! 

on a other not the game is quite fun has both roles in my opinion it's ballanced but the devs endevors make it even more ballanced since beta. True it's a hard game. your first few games might even frustrate you but mastery will bring you much pleasure.

Play has a survivor with a choice of 4 with different special perks that can be taught to your other survivor trough the blood web ( skill tree) activate generators, recue your mates ( or dont and watch them die) play has killer with a selection 3 with different gameplay. this one i will let you discover. but you need to kell everyone in various methodes.

for those wondering, playing with friends is comming, bindable keys are comming. everything is gonna be good people, just chill the fk out. more killers willl come over time cosmetics etc etc. it's 17 dollars people i already played the time worth with just the beta. come get recked with me when coop launch feel free to add me

Sadistic mind and cold hard steel heart may be required.

Fun game! Love playing it! Good ideas. I'm still new to the game and I have some suggestions:

Matchmaking - should make it so it assigns a random person to be the killer, rather than joining a killer

Maybe a few more search boxes
Permanent or buy able med kit so you don't have to rebuy it every time.

Make the recovery time a bit faster (like 25%)

The abilty to jump over tiny obstacles.

Maybe being able to crawl around without being down

And possibly even squeezing through small places to avoid the killer (make him go around)

A team chat would also be nice, but I understand why it wouldn't be included as it can be an unfair advantage.

Being able to have a teammate(s) or a group before entering a match.

And I don't know but I can't seem to find away to change controls/keybindings in game

With all that above, I would recommend this game as it is a good strategy and awareness game where you have to keep calm. They even have a "kill your friends" mode as a private match. Can't wait to see what they add next! Defiantly worth $20!

A horror looms in the distance, I can see the killer chasing my friend around the cornfield whilst me and another survivor repair one of the generators, suddenly I hear a heartbeat, its getting louder and louder and then I see him vaulting over the ledge behind us, QUICK!

 I manage to get away but unfortunately my friend suffers a rather unfortunate hooking and I can see the killer camping the area and priming a bear trap ready to fool the next unsuspecting Dwight! Theres no use in trying, he's as good as dead and I have to keep trying to repair these generators. Time passes and he's dead and i've managed to fix 3 generators by myself, im now the only person left and im bloody terrified...

I hear the heartbeat again and I look around frantically, im in some sort of barn with multiple hanging carcasses, eugh. Suddenly the killer runs right past me, I am literally inches away from him, I figure that he must have spotted me come in here...

Another close escape, but just as I leave through an open window I realise to my horror that ive made a grave mistake as I see him waltz right over to me from around the corner, I turn around and try to go back in through the window but its too late, he wrenches me from the window ledge and slings me over his shoulder, his back barbed with gnarled and twisted bits of metal digs into me and I panic.

Im being carried now, and I resign myself to my fate, im going to be sacrificed to the entity, it was all for nothing. I wish I never came on this stupid camping trip! I dont even try to wiggle free because I can see the hook is only meters away...

WHATS THIS?! The killer has walked right past the hook and dropped me on the floor right next to an open trap door he does a sort of gesture by slashing at the trapdoor with his bloody machete and as I look up at him in terror and confusion I quickly slink off into the darkness. I've survived? Im alive? what just happened? I guess that someone appreciated my mechanical skills!

Dont judge a killer by their looks, judge them by their actions (even if they murder all your friends)

10/10 would befriend serial killer again.
holy shit get this

still recommend to player who like this stuff
This game is badass, that's all i can say...I would highly recommend the game to anyone who loved outlast..

Tolles Spiel habe 8 Stunden bisher gespielt und es macht echt Spaß. Ich hoffe, dass noch weitere Mods & Maps kommen aber da kommt sicher noch viel, kam ja grad erst raus.

Positives: Idee an sich, Audioeffekte und Steuerung alles solide. Grafik , Overall Performance (Ich spiele mit ner SSD aber des Laden geht auch so echt schnell). Hier und dort kleine ruckler (auf Ultra)

Negatives: Balancing, es ist zwar schon einigermaßen gebalanced aber wenn n Killer einen mal aufgespießt hat is es im Endeffekt vorbei.
N Button oder Slider damit man wenigstens im Menu die Musik runda bzw wegdrehen kann, weil des Geplänkel einem nach gewisser Zeit ziemlich hart auf die Nerven geht. Wenn es Ingame dazugehört dann ist das okay aber Menu wäre es fast ein MUSS.

Grata sorpresa con el juego, tensión, cooperación y muchos nervios, deseando que saquen nuevos mapas y personajes.
No me arrepiento nada de los 15 euros que me ha costado, tanto para jugar con amigos como solo diversión asegurada...
3 маньяка и 7 крюков из 10

Классная выживалка с маньяком! Один существенный минусдолго ищет лобби!!
9/10

Un juego muy divertido .w./
Con sus errores y todo puede disfrutarse perfectamente, hay algunos problemas que la comunidad sabe muy bien que molestan mucho, como es el caso de gente que se retira de la sala de espera porque no encuentra a sus amigos, gente que se desconecta inoportunamente del juego. Pero dejando eso de lado, la diversion es el punto principal que el juego ofrece y cumple satisfactoriamente, usualmente a nadie le gusta tomar el papel de victima, pero este juego les da la oportunidad justa a los supervivientes para que la experiencia sea igual o mejor a ser el asesino, buen nivel de mantener las cossas parejas, a menos que te encuentres con gente con vario items por estar niveles mas altos que tu ewe
Awesome game that gives me a rising heart beat when trying to escape the killer. It's a must have!
Continua sendo bom

This is a great game, but I have had to request a refund as it is too scary for me to play. That should be taken as a sign of quality that the game does what it sets out to do. Don't buy if you are the kind of person, like me, who only plays Seven Days to Die with walking zombies and maximum advantages for the player.

I put half an hour into this and it was so intense, I was getting chest pains. Seriously. Guess I wont be getting the Friday 13th game when it comes out.

All credit to the studio though for a genuine horror experiance. Thanks, devs.

Es macht unendlich viel Spaß mal der Killer zu sein und denn gegenspielern das fürchten zu lehren, aber es macht auch bock (keine Ziege) den Killer zu viert aszuspielen. hmm... schwierige Wahl, jagen oder gejagt werden. In beiden fällen ist es eines der besten Horror, Survival Multiplayer Games (eigentlich auch mein erstes ; ) das bis jetzt gespielt habe!

Fun game but holy crap it was not done. This should have stayed in Beta/Development for a while longer. 
The netcode is all sorts of screwy for matchmaking, killers have to host the lobby, and most of the time the game only seems to dump groups of 4 on you at once. Tried reloading the game, same results. 
In a 1 hour window I spent 40 minutes waiting for matches. 10,000 people online per the stats page of Steam, but the game is not able to efficiently create matches with that large pool to pull from. 

All of that said, when I could get into a match this game was a damn blast! All of the Killers have different skills and abilities that make it interesting to gut the Survivors in new and exciting ways! 

I wish there was a maybe button for review because I like this game but it has some issues that need fixed before I am completely ready to say it is great. 
https://youtu.be/_xKc41TqMBk

В принципе в неё можно играть, но только если с друзьями. 
Сначала я хотел поставить дизлайк игре из-за того, что: во-первых, почти все убийцы имбовые (кроме трапера), взять к примеру духа (или как там его зовут): он заходит в инвиз, следит за мной, подкарауливает меня за углом (как гопник) и убивает. ЗАЕ БИСЬ. Во-вторых, сплошные дауны-аутисты. Опишу типичную ситуацию: я чиню генератор, когда надо нажимать пробел, не промахиваюсь, НО приходит отморозок, у которого либо нулевая реакция, либо не знает, что надо делать, тоже начинает чинить генератор, взрывает его убегает, я тоже, причём в разные стороны. Убийца прибегает на шум взрыва и находит меня, а не этого дауна и несёт к крюку. Если повезёт и убийца уйдёт от меня, то после того, как  он повесил меня на хук  эта тварь не придёт и не спасёт. Т.е. для них все, а они тебе в душу плюют. ЗАЕ БИСЬ.  И вот из-за таких даунов я не могу апнуть ранг
P.S. Научу определять таких даунов: они всегда 1 уровня и у них 20 ранг.
P.S.S. Но я всё равно продолжу играть в этот вынос мозга, ибо таких игр очень мало и мне они очень нравятся, потому что сама задумка с таким сюжетом выглядит не плохо. и я надеюсь, что всё же разрабы не обманут и скоро добавят игру с друзьями в паблике

Back in the days (10 yrs ago) I used to rule at games. I've lost every single one in dbd so far (5 or 6). You need a strategy for sure which might take some time to get in to. With that said it's been really fun & absolutely with the top games I've tried in the last years (average maybe 2 games/year so not a big player with kids now and all)

The game has some issues with balancing and bugs still, not to mention the ranking system that did not need to be changed from beta, but it's still a solid game. Overall definitely worth the $20 price tag-- I put in about 60 hours on beta and about 10-15 on release so far, and I'm still heavily enjoying the game. I just hope that the issues it does have are fixed by the devs so that they can move on to adding more content and improving the game.

Gameplay ok except for window vault abusement. Balance is fine. Little to no settings tho, no keybind menu.
Lobbies are bugged, game freezes randomly in menu for 10-40 seconds. No party system despite promises.
Played 32 hours of beta had tons of fun, thought the 1.0 version will be a finished product, it is still feeling like beta.
Don't buy... yet.

Мнение задрота, сидящего только на стороне выживающих. Я согласен с мнением, что лобби надо подкрутить. Живу далеко, но когда по мск где-то 12:00-13:00+ матчи находятся быстро. Описать эту игру можно фразой "игра эмоций". Очень многое здесь построенно на том, что бы вывести тебя из равновесия и тогда начинается пиздес. Когда ты уже без ошибок чинишь этот ёбаный трансформатор, а мимо пролетает пидрила и ветер ему сопли может на лицо, т.к. за ним гонятся, то ты либо сам даёшь стрекача, либо начинаешь фейлить ремонт из-за того, что руки дрожат.
Маньяки:
1. Трапер - по мне самый противный. Вся его игра построена на предугадывании шагов выживших и, если он понимает ход их мыслей, то вот медвежий капкан, а вот крюк тебе в спину.
2. Призрак - вся суть его в том, что когда он в инвизе, полагаться приходится на зрение. Однако каждый раз, когда он прячется, то начинает звенеть бубенцами на всю карту. На этом вся его сложность. Любимая тактика: насадить на крюк и встать в углу невидимым. Всегда говорю "спасибо". Потому что в инвизе бить он не может и ты тупо подлетаешь к крюку, начинаешь стаскивать другана. Он пока яйцами позвенит и войдёт в боевой режим, вы уже как тараканы от света разлетелись.
3. Сельский дурачок с бензопилой - парень, который постоянно, сука, постоянно капает на мозг. ВЕСЬ матч эта мразь носится по карте с гигантской скоростью и машет бензопилой. ПОСТОЯННО. Вот ты прячешься за деревом, а он завёл её и побежал в твою сторону. И вот у тебя есть секунды 2 чтобы понять: он знает, что ты там и время бежать или он просто патрулирует и надо, стиснув яйтса, не выходить.

Урон с руки у всех одинаковый, меняется лишь из специфика насаживания на кукан. Игре определённо есть куда развиваться, но она стоит не 2к, так что денег своих стоит.

Franchement : c'est complètement stupide de n'avoir aucune possibilité de configurer les commandes !!
On ne peut jouer quand QWERT !!!
là...  0/20
je rend  le jeu

I don't know whether it's my computer or the game but it lags like hell, so I haven't been able to actullay play which I am sad about as I was really looking forward to it.....It's probably my computer though :(

This game makes me twitchy with the creepy atmosphere, it gets your blood pumping seeing the killer off in the distance and when you hear the heartbeat. This game has succeeded in creating a great 4v1 cooperative horror game. There are however a few issues which is mostly due to the people playing the game.
First of all, campers at hooks, maybe the developers could make it such that the rate at which the entity kills you is slowed when the killer is around.
Secondly, some games can be laggy due to the host's internet connection or sometimes, your own.
Thirdly, at the moment you can't queue with friends as survivors however it has been said that that will be implemented soon.
Fourth, deranking due to people disconnecting
Lastly, there are some bugs which weren't present in the beta that have appeared likely due to the new maps and killers.
With all this said the game is worth it when you have friends to play it with as there is a private match mode so you can have fun hearing your friends scream and beg for mercy. Do note the game is skill based and you have to think how the survivors think when you're the killer and vice versa
After playing 10 rounds today I consider this game dogshit.
这游戏的匹配系统是真的脑溢血，你永远不知道你的队友是不是人。当杀手面救人的，把杀手引过来救人的，救人了不治疗的，辛辛苦苦溜了半天挂上去发现在那逛街的，美服各个都是奇才。

I have updated the review to say all the things i was complaining about have been fixed and i'm having more fun with it than i have in years. changed my review to positive
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

the new matchmaking they added screws over killer players like crazy, so much so they're leaving the game. Essentially, youre given a hidden rank that increases as you win games, but after a certain point only certain killers are viable at those ranks. if you want to play anything other than full sweaty meta builds and lose 30lbs of water per game, you're gonna lose over and over and over. expect to be mocked in post game chat if you lose, then raged at if you bring the sweaty "unfair" perks required to win. 

should also note queue times for survivors can be 5-15 mins while killers get a lobby nearly instantly since theres so few of them

i had a positive review but im changing it to negative as a result of the current issues

I think this is the nice game. but if there will be party mode it will be great.
I'am writting like but it doesn't means that game is finished product
heeeeeyyy... That's pretty goood!

This game is good, it is intense, it is gorey.

You can't play with friends in a public game, WTF?

игра прикольная стоит поиграть ,но надеюсь ,что хрень с поиском игрокоп после которово преходиться пересоздавать лобби исправят

Pros: fun game, brings fresh gameplay mechanics, nice character design, balanced and also randomised maps, good graphics and nice surround sound that adds to the atmosphere and suspanse. 
Cons: the menu and controls gave a feel that this is a console game-minimum settings (cant even select a lower music volume, only master volume) basic video setings or controls and also if you play with a mouse and keyboard the look is inverted and the aiming/navigation feels very clunky. many times i died because of camera controls rather than enemy skill.
Conclusion: i like the game, its fun both as the survivor and as the killer, but it needs a patch for the awful movement/camera control.
Good game overall

Do I recommend it? Eh...Maybe. It needs to get its shit together though to be a good game. Like the gameplay is good as its pretty fun being both killer and survivor. But everyone lobby hopping to find their friends because there is no party up option ruins the game. and also to mention. No key bindings. As soon as those things get put into the game. Its a no for me.

Questo gioco lo comprai sapendo della futura uscita del gioco di Venedi´ 13 tra un botto di  mesi e non me pento per niente (al momento).
Dead By Daylight e´un gioco assimetrale che ti mette nei panni di uno dei sopravissuti o nel serial killer  in una situazione 1vs4 , dove i sopravissuti non possono fare niente tranne che scappare o ritardare il loro infausto destino.

p.s. ho buttato diverse ore anche nella beta. ergo ignorate il fatto che siano solo 3 ore.


Al momento il gioco per i sopravissuti presenta solo due meccaniche : attivare i generatori e aprire una delle porte di uscite o rimanere l unico in vita e saltare in una delle botole d emergenza nascoste .
Stessa cosa anche per l assassino dato che l unico modo per uccidere le sue vittime e´colpirle due volte , raccoglierle da terra e appenderle come dei salami su dei ganci. Detta cosi´ il gameplay sembra noioso e ripetitivo ... E INVECE NO.

--------------------Prima di tutto bisogna dire che ---------
*le mappe non sono mai le stesse , studiarle servirä a poco  (tranne per gli edici , quelli so sempre gli stessi all interno) , quindi ci si troverä sempre in un area con dei pattern sconosciuti e si potrebbe avere alcune difficoltä a trovare i generatori richiesti.

*ad ogni lv up si droppano un sacco di item che vengono spesi a partita , il tuo loot non e´eterno perche´se muori lo perdi definitivamente, ergo ogni scelta  varia il metodo di gioco o le sorti della partita nel meglio  o nel peggio . Ma la soddisfazione nel riuscire a trovare una chest e a portarsi a casa il bottino (scappando ovviamente) e´troppo grande.
Con questo tipo di meccanica , le situazioni sono imprevedibili , potresti avere un giorno un medikit per curarti , ma avere una cassetta degli attrezzi un altro giorno per riparare in fretta , e la stessa cosa si puo´dire per il killer che puo´essere  piu´veloce a colpirti del solito o piu´silenzioso (tutto grazie a perk e molti oggetti).

*la tensione e´alle stelle , non scherzo , in questo gioco il poco gameplay viene compensato da una grandissima tensione e senso di stress che ti porta a sbagliare . "meglio andare a destra o a sinistra ? salvare l amico o scappare? piuttosto riparare questo generatore o scappare?" le scelte non saranno tante , ma lo stress e´abbondante.

*i diversi killer hanno diverse abilitä che li portano ad avere diversi stili di gioco , il che rende il tutto imprevedibile SOPRATUTTO CONTANDO IL FATTO CHE I  4 SOPRAVVISSUTI NON SAPRANNO QUALÉ´ LA CLASSE DEL KILLER FINO A CHE NON LO INCONTRANO. Il trapper usa delle trappole per orsi , uno diventa invisibile e un altro corre come un pazzo agitando una motosega. Il brivido della caccia e´palpabile e ogni sacrificio e´ una soddisfazione tremenda .

-questo gioco va assolutamente giocato con le cuffie , poiche´i killer possono sentire i passi dei sopravissuti , i loro lamenti quando feriti  o le loro sporche manacce trafficare sui generatori.
E la stessa cosa vale per i sopravissuti che con il battito cardiaco e una musica tetra di sottofondo capirete se siete vicini o lontani dal pericolo .

*grazie ad una patch ora si puo´giocare con alcuni amici in partite con altri giocatori (assassini inclusi) ergo il problema delle attese e´diminuito drasticamente. 


--------ora le cose negative----------

il sistema delle lobby e´mal costruito e le attese sono un po´fastidiose , dato che qualcuno puo sempre rimanere fermo e non premere accetta .( i dev hanno gia fatto diversi cambiamenti migliorando la situazione )


le mappe so 3 , i nemici so 3  e i modi per scappare o uccidere so sempre gli stessi , sinceramente non trovo questo un grosso effetto negativo , ma si puo´ben sperare in qualche futura novitä .

non aspettateve di poter usare il microfono con degli sconosciuti , i dev non vogliono mettere il voip perche´rovinerebbe l immersione , io sono d accordo comunque con sta cosa ma e´dovere di cronaca avvisare.
(se mai permetteranno di giocare con degi amici , usare roba come curse voice , steamchat o teamspeak non e´assolutamente vietato anzi e´incoraggiato ).


----------------------

Questo e´ un gioco buono , non ottimo ma decente , non merita piu´di 20 euro ma sicuramente da delle belle emozioni.
Se siete fan di venerdi´13 potreste provare sto gioco , ma anche no , aspettando l uscita del gioco ufficiale di quel franchise che comunque mostra delle meccaniche ben diverse e molto meglio sviluppate dato che e´ in sviluppo da una societä ben piu´matura ed esperta di questa.

Bisogna ricordarsi che gli sviluppatori dietro questo gioco sono giovani e alle prime armi , errori , bugs e altri problemi sono inevitabili , ma io voglio supportarli perche´sono stufo della solita roba e voglio che migliorino.

Il gioco e´piccolo nei contenuti , forte nelle emozioni e ha delle grandi possibilitä in futuro . 
20 euro sono piu´che onesti ; ma a vostro rischio.

voto 7 / 10 se amate le emozioni come il brivido della paura o della caccia.

Se la ripetitivitä vi stufa e vi arrabbiate facilmente se morite , non prendetelo , perche´e´assai normale che potreste essere spesso i primi a morire ( come il classico stereotipo del ragazzo sfigato nei film trash horror che muore sempre per primo.)

--------
piccola postilla , 
il gioco di venerdi 13 si presenta con meccaniche molto piu´complesse e ricche , con un jason estremamente piu´ forte dei mostri di sto gioco , con un gioco di tranelli e inganni molto piu´avanzato e molti ma molti piu´ metodi di sterminio di questo. Se vi piace Dead By Daylight potrebbe piacervi Venerdi 13 ma non posso confermare il contrario ,dato che la differenza e´gia ben notabile dalle alpha montage.

While I think the concept and overarching gameplay is solid, the developers did not take into the account that players are human and will always cheese mechanics and not actually play like a stereotypical killer.
Killers camp sites they've hooked someone on and its really boring to sit there on a hook knowing theres literally no chance of rescue or that you will escape because on top of that theres a trap under your feet. GG. much fun. such wow. Yeah I went there because that's how stupid that is.
On top of that enjoy TSA style random search checks in lockers because hiding in them does jack !@#% since your character makes so much effing noise whether you're hurt or not. 
Also developers don't really seem to be listening to feedback since I played through the beta and literally nothing has changed other than server stability.

It's fucking impossible to win as survivor, the killer has so many ways to detect you, you can't fucking do anything without being seen, and because everyone knows he is over-powered, everyone wants to play him, so you can't actually play a game as him, as it stands, don't buy this game unless you want to continuously play as survivor and lose.

I used to play this game religiously ever since the Closed Beta came out and I got lucky to get an early key. 
I supported it through the years and believed that BHVR (a very smol and humble devteam at that time, those early devstreams with McLean and Stefan.. oh the good days) truly cared about the game and its community. Bought every DLC, paid for the rift pass, bought some skins to support them.

But over time it became too obvious that this game needs a shake-up. Yes there's 4 new killers and/or survivors every year with brand new perks (which later becomes a part of the problem and I will explain that in a bit) but the core gameplay remains the same.

The mediocre matchmaking this game always had did not remedy the situation either. Especially after BHVR introduced dedicated servers and removed the ability to switch regions. You'll be stuck with the same players for the majority of the season with matchmaking being at least slightly diluted during the rank reset week (but at the same time that meant you'll get players that are not on your skill level and the games turn into a clown fiesta). Needless to say that the latest addition to the game - SBMM (skill-based matchmaking) is a complete joke and only made things worse.

Cheaters. The game always had problems with them, from perk stacking, to bots, to holding the game hostage and much more - all BHVR's pathetic attemps to curb the rampant cheater problem yielded no results. The EAC does absolutely nothing and at this point I can't even call it anti-cheat software. Reporting system that was half-implemented into the game does absolutely nothing, there is no feedback whether or not a cheater that you've had in your game has been banned or not. Your best option would be to have Steam deal with it by reporting the players profile directly.

Skin factory and the updates. Unfortunately, BHVR's decision to push out 4 major chapters in a year  inevitably lead to problems. Instead of balancing the game like reworking/releasing better maps, making sure that the perks are well tested and not borderline broken - devs are stuck in this "catch up" loop that results in community waiting for major fixes and changes for weeks or months before an issue is tackled. And of course I've got to mention the skins - their main source of revenue. People love cosmetics, sure. Even I bought them in my time. But when the devs release cosmetics on almost weekly basis instead of rolling out the improvements to the game - it becomes crystal clear where the focus of the development has shifted.

The endless pointless grind. For a veteran player it might not be that big of an issue to get the new killer/survivor to P3 all perks, but when you take into consideration someone who just started or are in the middle of their grind journey - you quickly realize just how much perks there is and the pile just keeps growing. It can and I'm sure it is daunting to see the amount of them. And the worst part is that majority of them are subpar at best because of the balancing stagnation.

It is truly disappointing to remember what potential this game had and how high my dreams and expectations were at the start of its life and realizing now what this game had become 6 years into development.

I left this game at the start of 2021 and I do not plan to come back unless they introduce a new gamemode/alternative objective. New killers and survivors with their perks just don't cut it as "variety" anymore.

In conclusion: unfortunately I cannot recommend it anymore. 
You'll get that feeling of thrill and excitement for the first 3-6 months of playing because you don't know anything. But once those feeling pass - you are immediately hit with reality: pointless and unrewarding grind, skin factory, subpar matchmaking, cheaters and lack of variety.

I was surprised that this game was actually good fun.

Insanely fun, it just needs party queing and it would be perfect. (which the devs have said they are working on asap) 10/10 once that is implemented!

It has some bugs and major balancing issues to iron out. It needs more optimizing and graphic config options. My 980ti can only get about 45-50 fps on ultra, and this is a game that does not have that much detail in it. It does not allow you to change your keybindings. It does not have true full screen, only full screen windowed. It is still very much a beta game.

It gets very old very quick. Not enough objectives or diverse gameplay to really keep me interested for very long. Survivors repair generators and sabotage hooks.. rinse and repeat.. Killers chase Survivors and put them on hooks and camp.. rinse and repeat.

The devs would need to come up with many more game modes and other content to keep people playing this game. The unfortunate thing about that is that most people will probably have migrated to other games that offer much more entertainment value by the time they come out with any substantial content.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты сделал предзаказ Deluxe Edition,а из всего обещанного тебе дали только 2 маски в PayDay 2...
 Dead by Daylight - это когда хочешь поиграть с друзьями,но не можешь,т.к в игре нету функции сбора открытого лобби...
 Dead by Daylight - это когда тебе обещают что проблемы и недочеты бета версии будут убраны в официальном релизе,а на самом деле их только прибавилось...
 Dead by Daylight - это когда ты спасаешь всю б л я т ь команду с крюка,но когда на него вешают тебя,на  тебя все кладут хуй и убегают куда глаза глядят...
 Dead by Daylight - это когда ты один включаешь все 5 генераторов,но когда приходит время сваливать маньяк обязательно убивает тебя одного,а вся команда благополучно съебывает как ни в чем не бывало...
 Dead by Daylight - это когда ты играя за маньяка,ты не можешь догнать уцелевшего,а когда ты играешь за уцелевшего ты не можешь убежать от маньяка...
 Dead by Daylight - это когда обещают к релизу добавить русский язык и откладывают эту затею еще на пару месяцев...
 Dead by Daylight - это когда рандомы прокачивают персонажей,они в первой же игре просрут все аптечки,фонарики и т.д,а после им несчем будет играть на высоких левлах...
 Dead by Daylight - это когда чтобы поиграть за маньяка ты ждешь в лобби от 15 до 40 минут и нет результатов,а когда заходишь за уцелевшего,то сразу находишь игру...

В целом игра конечно веселая,но в ней много недочетов.В "скором времени",разработчики обещают выпустить патч,благодаря которому можно будет играть с друзьями в открытом лобби и вот когда это произойдет,вот тогда игру можно будет покупать,а пока что это очередной трешак.

Sono stato costretto a modificare la mia recensione da positiva (scritta poche settimane dopo l'uscita del gioco) a negativa.
Il gioco da Giugno ad oggi non è migliorato, certo sono stati inseriti alcuni DLC che personalmente ho apprezzato ma non è stato minimamente ottimizzato dal punto di vista della fluidità grafica del gioco e i bug sono sempre presenti insieme ad occasionali crash.
L'idea di fondo è fantastica, mi aveva talmente colpito all'inizio da spingermi a preordinarlo senza pensarci due volte.
Purtroppo rimane un gioco acerbo che ha bisogno di miglioramenti non dal punto di vista dei contenuti ma dal punto di vista del gameplay.

ERGO:
- Compratelo se volete un gioco di una tipologia nuova, fuori dagli schemi di tutti i giochi survival/horror già visti (ma con ancora evidenti problemi come già citato).
- Non compratelo e aspettate per vedere come si evolverà la situazione se non siete del tutto convinti, anche se il prezzo non è elevato.

Grazie dell'attenzione ;P

This is the first game I've refunded. It is completely broken. Animations don't trigger, sometimes your character will disappear (and the UI won't show up so you can't even exit the game), audio glitches happen constantly, and hit detection is incredibly suspect. I suppose I should have expected that from Behavior, but the new association with Starbreeze -- and a fairly lengthy beta period -- gave me hope. Plus, it's a great concept for a multiplayer game.

Even without glitches, the progression system is incredibly arcane, and the Wraith seems like the obvious choice when it comes to Killers -- being able to walk around completely invisible is pretty useful, it turns out. The guy with the chainsaw can only dash in a (mostly, there's some slight steering) straight line with it, which sucks considering the survivors' whole thing is going around corners, through windows, etc. The third character's traps seem ok, but they aren't very well hidden, and you'd have to be half blind to get caught by them.

If the glitches get fixed, and it retains a good playerbase, I'll pick it up when it gets a substantial discount. Until then, no thank you.

at this stage,.. i can't recommend this game.. it has a REALLY good idea,.. one that Friday the Thirteenth is pulling off way better unfortunately,..
the downfall is in the constant repair of generators to escape a killer,.. it feels like a "game mode" in a much large game.
it was fun for a couple matches but then i felt like i wanted to play the other content.. which does not exist,.. and doesn't look like there is any in the works, but for more of the same...
i get that light keeps them at bay or w/e.. but the level is pretty much open to escape,.. if a survivor can survive a huge thwack of a machete,.. they can climb over a wooden wall/gate... especially if they have such good engineering skills
idea 10/10 but derivative of FT13th
gameplay 7/10 fun but flawed
depth / replay-ability .. 3/10 one mode that gets boring fast win or lose
its fun to lose and win,.. but it gets old fast,.. ... like the culling... it;s a one trick pony

for now at least

I wish I could rate this 1 to 10, or express a neutral review, but I'm unfortunately restricted to positive/negative as a simplistic measurement. I'll summarise the positives/negatives for a clear overview of the experience. 

Positive:
--Atmospheric, procedural maps
--Unique, tense premise
--Effective balancing 
--Unique killer traits (Invisibility, Trapping and Chainsaw Charge)

Negative:
--Minimal customisation to appearance (implied otherwise from concept art)
--Superficial perks
--Superfluous items
--3 maps, 3 killers, 4 survivors
--Identical functionally to BETA 


Overall, the experience is highly enjoyable, but it's severely restricted in content, which is impossible for the community to improve from a lack of mod support, and the perks/items are shallow (at best) to have minimal impact on the experience for a higher dynamic playthrough each time. However, the three maps - which are sadly limited to three for theme/setpieces - do have unique placement for the objective(s) and these do foster a degree of variety. 

For £15, it's worthwhile for those craving this unique premise - no alternatives available - but I'd recommend one to wait until there are competitors or this receives considerable updates as it's currently equal to the BETA overall in content.

Devs cant even fix the bugs from the beta (Killer leaves game, you lose rank; you dont gain Rank randomly even though you earned enough points for ranking up), which is pretty sad. What was the point of the beta anyway? Also there is no party system with your friends, even though they promised a pre party system day 1. All these points need to be fixed before i even think about recommending this game.

Night 1: I awake to a smell of blood and putrid rot. I look around, viewing hooks caked in the blood of those who were there and have already passed. I look to my immediate right as i manage to stand up, my strength returning. I see a blade made of metal, and remember it from my old life. The same one i crafted out of the metal of my father's mines. I walk through the forest, seeing an old mask lying on a table, i carve it and make it into my own form, i then place it over myself. Understanding my purpose now, i grab a bear trap. I walk into the night and begin to prepare.

Night 2: I notice strange scratches that glow like embers on a wall nearby, i hear the faint breath of another being close by. I follow suit, eventually coming to a red painted locker, i look at it and listen, hearing breaths. This is it. I open the locker- my first victim- splayed out before me, like an offering to the gods. I grab him and drag him from the locker by the throat. I lift him over my shoulder and carry him to one of the hooks, understanding it's purpose, yet not it's function. I place several bear traps around the perimeter and wait in the shadows.

Night 3: My victim long dead, taken up into the night by some strange claws. These claws, this Entity, calls to me. I find more of the strange scratches, yet this time, as i follow, i hear a loud noise and turn to see a light in the distant sky. This will not go unpunished. I hastily make my way to the light, finding tools and various supplies scattered around a generator, i realize my objective now. To defend these generators. I go a few meters away from the generator and hear rustling behind a tree near me. I stop in my tracks, listening, and hearing the breath of this person, this... sacrifice. I go towards the tree and around it, seeing the person attempting to hide amongst the grasses. I reach for him, but he jumps up and runs, i give chase, thrilled. As i chase him, he pulls down obstacles to get in my way, but as he is pulling one down, i strike him.

Night 4: I followed the blood trail to another set of generators, the trail stopped. I look around, hearing sounds of medical supplies being applied. I go around the corner and a woman is helping the man i had injured. Makeshift bandages being replaced by real ones from the medical supplies contained in the chests. I go towards them, swinging my cleaver and hitting the man i had previously injured, the bandages are gone through and it goes into his back, disabling him. I grab the woman as she jumps over a barricade. I then drag them both, screaming, to a hook, hang one, another hook, and hang the other. This cycle will never end, the pain will never end. I will spill blood until i have no use to the Entity that sustains me.

Night 5: Capture, Hang, Repeat. Capture, Hang, Repeat. Capture, Hang, Repeat. Capture, Hang, Repeat.
